definition: to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: Simulation results show that the real - time interpolation algorithm is workable.
sentences.chinese: 仿真結果表明，該實時插補控制算法是可行的。

sentences.english: In this thesis, the saddle-shaped curve direct interpolation algorithm is studied and proposed.
sentences.chinese: 研究提出了馬鞍型曲線的直接插補算法。

sentences.english: This method is efficient and with little error.
sentences.chinese: 該方法插補效率高，誤差小。

sentences.english: Except interpolation function, the controlling part has some other subsidiary functions.
sentences.chinese: 控制部分除具有插補功能外，還具有多種輔助功能。
